courses.title: Introduction to Guitar
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing guitar, including chords, strumming, and fingerpicking.

courses.title: Advanced Piano Techniques
courses.description: Master advanced piano techniques, including arpeggios, scales, and complex compositions.

courses.title: Drumming for Beginners
courses.description: Start your drumming journey with this beginner course covering rhythms, beats, and basic drum kit setup.

courses.title: Vocal Training 101
courses.description: Improve your singing voice with techniques for breath control, pitch, and vocal range expansion.

courses.title: Music Theory Basics
courses.description: Understand the fundamentals of music theory, including notation, harmony, and melody.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation
courses.description: Learn to improvise in the jazz style, covering scales, chord progressions, and soloing techniques.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Create electronic music with this course on DAWs, synths, and beat-making.

courses.title: Classical Violin
courses.description: Master the classical violin repertoire, techniques, and performance practices.
